name: tinpot
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not important or deserving respect: What was the good of a BA from that tinpot university anyway? a tinpot dictator They treated us like a tin-pot banana republic instead of a sovereign country.
More examplesFewer examplesThe British people spent the war trying to laugh at the tinpot dictators they were fighting.He's playing now for some tinpot club in Essex.The country was run by a junta of tin-pot military dictators.
